_comment: QTS Risk Management Configuration - Enforces strict caps, stops, and circuit breakers
_leverage_btc_eth_comment: Maximum leverage for BTC and ETH positions
_leverage_other_comment: Maximum leverage for all other symbols
_leverage_gross_comment: Maximum gross portfolio leverage (all positions combined)
_notional_per_symbol_comment: Maximum position size per symbol as fraction of equity (25%)
_notional_gross_comment: Maximum total notional exposure as fraction of equity (100%)
_atr_multiplier_comment: ATR multiplier for dynamic stop calculation (1.5x ATR)
_daily_loss_limit_comment: Daily loss limit: -5% triggers auto-flatten and cooldown
_daily_loss_cooldown_min_comment: Cooldown period after daily loss limit hit (60 minutes)
_max_drawdown_comment: Maximum drawdown from peak equity: -10% halts all trading
_max_orders_per_min_comment: Maximum order rate: 30 orders per minute
_circuit_breaker_cooldown_min_comment: Circuit breaker cooldown: 60 minutes after trigger
_notes: All percentage values are decimal fractions (e.g., 0.05 = 5%)
Leverage caps apply to individual positions; gross caps apply to portfolio total
Stop-loss is MANDATORY for all trades; bounds prevent unreasonable stops
Daily loss limit auto-flattens all positions and enters cooldown
Max drawdown from peak equity triggers emergency halt until manual review
